Wednesday, June 28th, 2017
Changes from previous version of SteamBot (MechBot) to this one:
Streamlining game play to reduce delays:
  • Removing the open door animation before the main menu appears; looks nice, but unnecessary delay at game start.
  • Removing the need to wait for steam to build at game start. Start the game with 50% steam, 100% water â€” the player can decide if they want to build up more steam or start immediately.
  • Reducing the time needed to build up steam on the burners
  • Remove the need to wait at end of level to show scores. Will transition to new screen at level end with all specs on screen at once.
